member.name: T:SMACD.Data.AbuseCaseModel
member.summary: Represents an Abuse Case: a way an attacker can abuse a resource to break a use case

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.AbuseCaseModel.Actions
member.summary: Plugins that can be used to scan for this abuse case

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.AbuseCaseModel.Name
member.summary: Name of abuse case

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.AbuseCaseModel.Description
member.summary: Description of how abuse case works

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.AbuseCaseModel.Owners
member.summary: Business owners of this abuse case

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.AbuseCaseModel.BusinessRisk
member.summary: Relative level of risk for this Abuse Case in comparison to other Abuse Cases for this Use Case A high business risk may indicate that the Abuse Case could access sensitive data

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.AbuseCaseModel.TechnicalRisk
member.summary: Relative level of technical risk for this Abuse Case in comparison to other Abuse Cases for this Use Case A high technical risk may indicate that there is a low degree of complexity to technically attack the targets associated with this Abuse Case

member.name: T:SMACD.Data.ActionPointerModel
member.summary: Stores information about a plugin and how to run it against an abuse case

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.ActionPointerModel.Action
member.summary: Provides the unique identifier for the Action associated with this Pointer

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.ActionPointerModel.Options
member.summary: Parameters to pass to Action to adjust its execution

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.ActionPointerModel.Target
member.summary: Target to be acted upon by the Action

member.name: M:SMACD.Data.ActionPointerModel.ToString
member.summary: String representation of Action with configuration

member.name: T:SMACD.Data.EnvironmentSettings
member.summary: Configuration options for applications using this Service Map

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.EnvironmentSettings.Whitelist
member.summary: Extensions which will be allowed to execute when running this Service Map

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.EnvironmentSettings.Blacklist
member.summary: Extensions which are not allowed to execute when running this Service Map

member.name: T:SMACD.Data.FeatureModel
member.summary: Represents a Feature: A group of Use Cases that, together, accomplish a larger functional task

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.FeatureModel.UseCases
member.summary: Use Cases that make up the Feature

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.FeatureModel.Name
member.summary: Name of the Feature

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.FeatureModel.Description
member.summary: Description of what the Feature does

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.FeatureModel.Owners
member.summary: Business owners for the Feature

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.FeatureModel.BusinessRisk
member.summary: Relative level of risk for this Feature in comparison to other Features A high business risk may indicate that the Feature could access sensitive data

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.FeatureModel.TechnicalRisk
member.summary: Relative level of technical risk for this Feature in comparison to other Features A high technical risk may indicate that there is a low degree of complexity to technically attack the targets associated with this Feature

member.name: T:SMACD.Data.IBusinessEntityModel
member.summary: Represents a business entity in the system, which tracks ownership and risk from a project management perspective

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.IBusinessEntityModel.Name
member.summary: Name of business entity

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.IBusinessEntityModel.Description
member.summary: Description of business entity

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.IBusinessEntityModel.Owners
member.summary: Business owners for this entity

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.IBusinessEntityModel.BusinessRisk
member.summary: Relative level of risk for this entity in comparison to other entities in this generation A high business risk may indicate that the entity manages sensitive data

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.IBusinessEntityModel.TechnicalRisk
member.summary: Relative level of technical risk for this entity in comparison to other entities in this generation A high technical risk may indicate that there is a low degree of complexity to technically attack the targets associated with this entity

member.name: T:SMACD.Data.IModel
member.summary: Common interface to show a data type as a data Model for the system

member.summary: Name of the owner

member.summary: Contact e-mail for the owner

member.summary: Hostname or IP address of system to connect to

member.summary: Abuse cases that can be done to misuse this use case

member.summary: Description of what the use case does

member.summary: Business owners of this use case

member.summary: Relative level of risk for this Use Case in comparison to other Use Cases for this Feature A high business risk may indicate that the Use Case could access sensitive data

member.name: P:SMACD.Data.UseCaseModel.TechnicalRisk
